Compatible with iOS 9, 10 and 11.

Please note that this package is completey free for all Copic 2 users who bought Copic 2 on or before 'October 17, 2017'.

Copic For WhatsApp brings ability to display the Contact pictures instandard views such as Recents, Contact and Chat screens. Please ensure that you have a valid license forbefore installing this tweak. Requires Copic 2 and all settings of this plugin can be configured under Copic's WhatsApp settings.

Please note that a valid license ofis required to use this little tweak. This tweak doesn't add any extra icon on your SpringBoard.

This adds settings to's settings as shown in the below screenshots.

*Customisable settings under's settings.

*Ability to turn on/off show contact pictures on different screens of.

*Round or Square or no pictures at all.

*Chat pictures inside a conversation.

1. Added support for 11.3.1
2. Added support for latest WhatsApp (2.18.70)
